languages.text: "Вы закрыли узел на карантин на двадцать вахт и отказывались выдать пайки без талонов. Талонов, которые мы не могли заработать!"
"You quarantined the hub for twenty watches and refused to give out rations if we didn't have cards. Cards we had no way to earn!"
languages.original_text: "Вы закрыли узел на карантин на двадцать вахт и отказывались выдать пайки без талонов. Талонов, которые мы не могли заработать!"

traits.locale_text: "You quarantined the hub for twenty watches and refused to hand out rations without cards. Cards we had no way to earn!"
"You quarantined the hub for twenty watches and refused to hand out rations without cards. Cards we had no way to earn!"
"You quarantined the hub for twenty watches and refused to give out rations if we didn't have cards. Cards we had no way to earn!"
"You quarantined the hub for twenty watches and refused to give out rations if we didn't have cards. Cards we had no way to earn!"
"You quarantined the hub for twenty watches and refused to give out rations if we didn't have cards. Cards we had no way to earn!"
"You quarantined the hub for twenty watches and refused to give out rations if we didn't have cards. Cards we had no way to earn!"

languages.text: «Dejasteis el centro en cuarentena durante veinte guardias y os negasteis a darnos raciones si no teníamos tarjetas. ¡Tarjetas que era imposible conseguir!».
languages.original_text: "You quarantined the hub for twenty watches and refused to give out rations if we didn't have cards. Cards we had no way to earn!"

traits.locale_text: «Dejasteis el centro en cuarentena durante veinte guardias y os negasteis a darnos raciones si no teníamos tarjetas. ¡Tarjetas que era imposible conseguir!».

languages.text: 「お前たちはハブを20ウォッチ隔離して、カードがない者への配給を拒否したじゃないか！カードを得るすべもないのに！」
languages.original_text: "You quarantined the hub for twenty watches and refused to give out rations if we didn't have cards. Cards we had no way to earn!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前たちはハブを20ウォッチ隔離して、カードがない者への配給を拒否したじゃないか！カードを得るすべもないのに！」

languages.text: “你把枢纽区域隔离了二十巡！像这个样子，我们根本挣不到配给卡！可要是没有配给卡，我们就拿不到配给了！”
languages.original_text: "You quarantined the hub for twenty watches and refused to give out rations if we didn't have cards. Cards we had no way to earn!"

traits.locale_text: “你把枢纽区域隔离了二十巡！像这个样子，我们根本挣不到配给卡！可要是没有配给卡，我们就拿不到配给了！”

languages.text: "Ihr habt die Zentrale für zwanzig Wachschichten unter Quarantäne gestellt und Euch geweigert, Rationen auszugeben, wenn wir keine Marken hätten. Marken, die wir überhaupt nicht verdienen konnten!"
languages.original_text: "You quarantined the hub for twenty watches and refused to give out rations if we didn't have cards. Cards we had no way to earn!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt die Zentrale für zwanzig Wachschichten unter Quarantäne gestellt und Euch geweigert, Rationen auszugeben, wenn wir keine Marken hätten. Marken, die wir überhaupt nicht verdienen konnten!"

languages.text: « Vous avez mis le relais en quarantaine pendant vingt quarts et refusé de distribuer des rations à ceux qui n'avaient pas de tickets. Tickets qu'on ne pouvait pas gagner, puisqu'on ne pouvait pas travailler ! »
languages.original_text: "You quarantined the hub for twenty watches and refused to give out rations if we didn't have cards. Cards we had no way to earn!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez mis le relais en quarantaine pendant vingt quarts et refusé de distribuer des rations à ceux qui n'avaient pas de tickets. Tickets qu'on ne pouvait pas gagner, puisqu'on ne pouvait pas travailler ! »

languages.text: "Merkezi tam yirmi vardiya boyunca karantinaya aldınız ve kartımız yoksa kumanya vermediniz. Kartları nasıl kazanalım biz?"
languages.original_text: "You quarantined the hub for twenty watches and refused to give out rations if we didn't have cards. Cards we had no way to earn!"
